result.reason: In fullscreen mode, DesktopWidth/Height are set from screen.Bounds (logical pixels) multiplied by ResolutionScalingFactor, which understates the actual physical resolution on high-DPI monitors where Bounds returns scaled logical dimensions instead of raw pixel counts.
result.approach: Replace screen.Bounds with the physical pixel resolution (via Graphics.FromHwnd DpiX/DpiY or Win32 GetDeviceCaps DESKTOPHORZRES) when computing DesktopWidth/Height for fullscreen at lines 1112-1113 and 1156-1157
